thread.section_title: Melia Paris La Defense - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Courbevoie, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: wow what a hotel !!
thread.title_full: wow what a hotel !! - Review of Melia Paris La Defense, Courbevoie, France - TripAdvisor

author: Dungeonmaster42
title: wow what a hotel !!
text:
Amazing hotel.
Would definitely book again
Great staff, clean hotel, amazing smell in hotel reception area.
Room sizes are amazing with a great view towards the eiffel tower
Shower/bathroom area is really nice
Can't fault the hotel one bit. Would recommend anyone to just book this hotel.
Breakfast is really good and service is amazing.
Getting into Paris city center is quick and easy with metro.
Loads of shops and food places nearby.
Hotel has bar on top level and restaurant.
Bed is comfortable and overall incredibly comfortable stay.
I mainly wanted to book this hotel as it ticked more box's than the hotels in the city center.
